rule: Each description must conclude by conveying the emotional feeling or atmosphere that the image should evoke in the viewer.
input: A nostalgic and melancholic mood permeates the scene, reminding viewers of past memories and heartfelt moments.
coverage: A middle-aged woman with long, flowing brunette hair and a vintage lace dress sits pensively on a weathered wooden bench in a serene, autumnal park. She gently holds an old, sepia-toned photograph, her eyes reflecting deep nostalgia. The soft, golden light of the late afternoon sun filters through the colorful, falling leaves, casting delicate shadows around her. Behind her, a gently winding path and scattered foliage create a tranquil background. The scene evokes a melancholic and heartfelt atmosphere, reminiscent of cherished past memories.
validityText:
The input is a clear, concise natural language description intended for creating an AI-generated photo prompt. It is written in English, contains only 16 words (well under the 80-word limit), and is presented as a single paragraph. Therefore, it fully complies with the input specification.
OK
